entity.name: `useCallback`
entity.description: `useCallback` is a React Hook that lets you cache a function definition between re-renders.
entity.descriptionClean: useCallback is a React Hook that lets you cache a function definition between re-renders.
entity.descriptionHtml: useCallback is a React Hook that lets you cache a function definition between re-renders.

entity.name: `useContext`
entity.description: `useContext` is a React Hook that lets you read and subscribe to context from your component.
entity.descriptionClean: useContext is a React Hook that lets you read and subscribe to context from your component.
entity.descriptionHtml: useContext is a React Hook that lets you read and subscribe to context from your component.

example.codeHighlighted: const value = useContext(SomeContext)

entity.name: `useDeferredValue`
entity.description: `useDeferredValue` is a React Hook that lets you defer updating a part of the UI.
entity.descriptionClean: useDeferredValue is a React Hook that lets you defer updating a part of the UI.
entity.descriptionHtml: useDeferredValue is a React Hook that lets you defer updating a part of the UI.

entity.name: `useEffect`
entity.description: `useEffect` is a React Hook that lets you synchronize a component with an external system.
entity.descriptionClean: useEffect is a React Hook that lets you synchronize a component with an external system.
entity.descriptionHtml: useEffect is a React Hook that lets you synchronize a component with an external system.

entity.name: `useId`
entity.description: `useId` is a React Hook for generating unique IDs that can be passed to accessibility attributes.
entity.descriptionClean: useId is a React Hook for generating unique IDs that can be passed to accessibility attributes.
entity.descriptionHtml: useId is a React Hook for generating unique IDs that can be passed to accessibility attributes.

entity.name: `useMemo`
entity.description: `useMemo` is a React Hook that lets you cache the result of a calculation between re-renders.
entity.descriptionClean: useMemo is a React Hook that lets you cache the result of a calculation between re-renders.
entity.descriptionHtml: useMemo is a React Hook that lets you cache the result of a calculation between re-renders.

entity.name: `useRef`
entity.description: `useRef` is a React Hook that lets you reference a value that’s not needed for rendering.
entity.descriptionClean: useRef is a React Hook that lets you reference a value that’s not needed for rendering.
entity.descriptionHtml: useRef is a React Hook that lets you reference a value that’s not needed for rendering.

entity.name: `useState`
entity.description: `useState` is a React Hook that lets you add a state variable to your component.
entity.descriptionClean: useState is a React Hook that lets you add a state variable to your component.
entity.descriptionHtml: useState is a React Hook that lets you add a state variable to your component.

entity.name: `useSyncExternalStore`
entity.description: `useSyncExternalStore` is a React Hook that lets you subscribe to an external store.
entity.descriptionClean: useSyncExternalStore is a React Hook that lets you subscribe to an external store.
